string-array.item: Meet the Deadliner that understands you

string-array.name: intro_descriptions
string-array.item: ✨ Brand new v3 — upgraded UI and smoother task and habit management.
Still the same flow: swipe right to complete ✅ swipe left to delete ❌, with easy pin and countdown control.
🤖 Deadliner AI — just one sentence creates tasks and reminders in seconds.
☁️ WebDAV cloud sync keeps your data seamless and secure across devices.
🔔 New widgets and smarter notifications make everything clearer and more intuitive.
